name: Magic Wand
description: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

abilities.name: Energy Charge
abilities.description: Instantly heals and and replenishes the caster's health and mana per accumulated charge.
notes: Has no recharge time. Cooldown resetting effects do not restore charges.
Instead, gains a charge whenever a visible enemy casts an ability nearby.
When upgraded to Holy Locket, all the current charges are carried over.
Gains 1 charge for each ability cast by an enemy.
Does not gain charges from active attack modifiers, toggle-able abilities, other sources, active abilities that are procced passively, or abilities cast out of invisibility.
With multiple copies within the inventory, the oldest item gains charges first.
Can heal and mana restore up to 300 with max charges.

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant 66 health and 0.3 health regeneration.
36 mana, 0.15 mana regeneration and 0.3% flat base magic resistance.
3 main attack damage to all Strength/Agility/Intelligence heroes.
4.05 main attack damage to universal heroes.
